## Point de vue de l'auteur.e (2/3)

### √âtape 3: reproductibilit√©

Un `git push` lancera l'action d√©di√©e √† la compilation et la publication
``` yaml
name: build
on: push
jobs:
  build-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Check out repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Set up quarto
        uses: quarto-dev/quarto-actions/setup@v2
        # [...]

      - name: Install Computo extension for Quarto
        run: |
            quarto add --no-prompt computorg/computo-quarto-extension

      - name: Install Python and Dependencies
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        # [...]
      - run: pip install -r requirements.txt

      - name: Render and Publish
        uses: quarto-dev/quarto-actions/publish@v2
        # [...]
```
